features: FOR EVEN THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN: We’ve designed our laundry sheets to be gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin. Our hypoallergenic laundry detergent is Dye, Chlorine, Paraben and Phosphate free with magic cleaning power.

GENTLE & INCREDIBLY EFFECTIVE: Our Laundry Detergent is scientifically formulated with clean ingredients to powerfully lift stains and leave you with fresh clothing – often even more effectively than synthetic, chemical-filled liquid detergents

GOOD FOR YOU, GOOD FOR THE ENVIRONMENT: Our eco friendly detergent is smaller and lighter than that yucky traditional laundry detergent sold in plastic packaging. Clean People comes in recyclable paper packaging, so no more plastic jugs in the landfill and no phosphates, parabens, phthalates, chlorine bleach, artificial dyes, petroleum, or ammonia in your laundry!

SAFE FOR ALL WASHING MACHINES: This Septic safe laundry detergent can be used with top Loaders, Front Loaders, and HE (High Efficiency). Comes with 32 Sheets of Clean People Ultra Concentrated Laundry Detergent Sheets. Thats 32 Loads!

VEGAN & CRUELTY FREE: We’ll never test Clean People on animals, ever. In fact, we don't just stop at refusing to do harm - we choose to do good. For every 96 Pack (or larger) sold, we plant a tree in your name

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made in Canada!! Not China
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. I switch to it as my previous product was made in China. This is made in Canada, which I have no objection to. Works good, cleans well and laundry smells great. Easy to store, easy to handle and work with. No sloppy, sticky liquid to work with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great way to reduce plastic
reviews.reviewText: These work well. The scent is a little strong for me, but my clothes are clean! And my clothes actually just smell clean after the wash; they don't smell like detergent. I'm happy to reduce my plastic use through this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Great for Everyday Washing
reviews.reviewText: First the small size is great. The smell is amazing and strong in the package. The smell reduces after washing which I prefer because it’s not overpowering but still smells fresh and clean. I have a washer that doesn’t fill all the way with water ,so unfortunately these left a film on one of my blankets and I had to rewash it. It also didn’t work well for my towels so I again had to rewash. I think for everyday washing they will work well, but I’ll have to keep looking for eco friendly products that work better for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product! Start with packaging, small & compact=no waste. I buy the fresh & clean scent which smells great & our clothes are stain free! Last long & is at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After trying many detergents I found this one really works.The scent is very pleasant and not over powering at all. My clothes come out cleaner and.brighter not to mention it is so easy to use. I was a little nervous when it came because I couldn’t figure out how these small sheets of product could work , boy was I surprised. Not only do they work well but they are so easy and there is no mess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comprable cleaning power
reviews.reviewText: Love that it is so environmentally friendly. There is no big plastic containers to rinse forever for recycling. You don’t have to wonder if it’s really getting recycled, or what kind of other environmental issues are being caused by the plastic recycling process. It is extremely easy to use with no messes, and it cleans as well as any other laundry soap/detergent I have used. The minimal amount of cardboard used for the size of the packaging is at least a renewable resource when handled properly. Have to start improvements the best you can somewhere :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using these now for over a month. It cleans my clothes and they smell fresh! I love that it comes in a small, like very small, cardboard box. I do not have to clog up the earth with large plastic bottles anymore. I am extremely impressed with how well these tiny little sheets clean my laundry. I am very happy with this purchase and I am not sacrificing anything and making the world a greener place to live!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a front-loader, and have been searching for awhile how to stop having to buy, carry upstairs and deal with recycling all those huge plastic jugs. This detergent works great - even took out a set butter stain that I didn't realize was on a cotton shirt until I put it in the washer. I use a half strip for most loads, full one for sheets/towels large loads. Does the trick, dissolves well, never had a problem that way. Wish the paper packaging was a little stiffer, and that it cost a little less, but I'm buying it again. Have used it 3-4 times a week for at least 6 weeks for consistent results. No stinky perfumes, barely detectable scent to my nose.
